name: Beat Dwarf - Willie's Tiny Games
description:
Back to the mines once again, it seems. Mine the ore as best you can, but time it right! This ore is fickle, with brief windows where your fists can smash them. I'll be keeping an eye on you- mess up too many times, and you're fired!

Made by Willie Kirby using Pico-8, for CU Boulder's Tiny Games course.
